EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Mike, I just got your voicemail, 3:30pm EST works for me, I send you an outlook invite. Talk to you then,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com [mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, December 18, 2012 6:15 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: SRA update, review estimate When are you available?Sent on the Sprint® Now Network from my BlackBerry®From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Date: Tue, 18 Dec 2012 23:05:04 +0000To: m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com<m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com <mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com%3cm_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com>>Subject: SRA update, review estimate Hi Mike, I heard back from SRA. They want to do T&M contract capped at 150 hours. They will want you to report time weekly (so you don’t have to keep track of time for a long period – they hope this will ease the burden of keeping track.) It is going to be Ron’s job at SRA to manage the hours. All that being said I figured out that we would have to bill $105.50 per hour to get you under $13k on a W-2 for these 150 hours. I have attached the estimate and I would like to review it with you. Give me a ring when you have a few moments to discuss. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdm5SoF176vaLc4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdm5SoF176vaLc4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
